website_summaries.verdict: We'd have a much easier time recommending the Logitech Z520's average sound quality and lack of features if it didn't cost $130. We'd rather point you toward the Logitech Z523 system that offers best-in-class sound quality (and a subwoofer to boot) at an affordable price.
pros: Rear-facing tweeters provide pseudo surround sound
cons: lacks RCA audio input, no bass or treble controls

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth the $100
customer_reviews.text: I am a no audiophile, but I love music. They are replacing two pretty loud (25 watt) Harman/Kardons. The sound is wonderful, like having a stereo at the desk. Robust. Does challenging stuff very well, like Straight No Chaser's a capella version of "The man who can't be moved." I mean, just on that song alone, the bass blew me away. Louder than my ears can handle when sitting at the desk. Price point is perfect. I mean, you get a really good experience, and you don't have to pay an arm & leg. And you get it without a subwoofer. Awesome. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Total scam and rip off.
customer_reviews.text: Those are TERRIBLE and I am returning them. These are OBVIOUSLY used, and there is no way to plug them into a US wall outlet. They shipped some kind of weird foreign plug, with a crazy 2 prong thing that clips in and out of it. There is literally no way to power them. Absolute and complete RIP OFF. AVOID AVOID AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Packard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this product before I bought it and wasn't really sure what to expect, but it did have high ratings, in spite of some criticism it received. I guess I'm not as picky as some, but I did want speakers with a good sound for movies, videos, music, etc. These turned out to be very good speakers. Would I use them to play music for a large party in my back yard? Probably not. But to play a Celene Dion duet with Andrea Bocelli in my living room (I like to play my music loud).....very nice! I am very pleased with my purchase. Amazon comes through for me again!
customer_reviews.author: mroberts

customer_reviews.title: Way Too Much Bass!
customer_reviews.text: I opted for this set of speakers for the office only because I got tired of shopping. Easy set-up, but the sound quality leaves a lot to be desired - it's all bass :( and you cannot adjust the levels. They put the tweeters on the back, so maybe that contributes to the overriding effect of bass. The picture should have clued me in - it shows the large bass speaker out of proportion to the smaller mid-range and you don't even see the tweeters. I kept them because it was easier than returning them. What the heck - for the office, they're ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dory

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This product has been reviewed so many times, all of the details are covered in other reviews. It is those reviews that largely convinced me to purchase this item - and all I can say is that I am completely satisfied. For general PC use, games, listening to music or watching movies or Youtube vids - it covers all the bases nicely, and if I want to crank up the volume so others can hear around the room or in the adjacent room, they are up to the task.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These speakers rock!
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock! I've very cheap when it comes to computer speakers - I mean I have all the "real" stereo equipment in the living room right? But I spend mega hours at the desk and I needs me my tunes! And sometimes the only way to get through a tough workday is to drown it out in music. I listen to everything from quiet guitar music to techno pop and these things sound great! These more than fit the bill and are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Donut

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding desktop speakers I have ever heard. Razor sharp sound, very natural sounding voices in singing or speaking, no boominess, OK Bass, they have 3 inch (7.5cm) low frequency speakers and there is a limit to how low they can go. For desktop speakers, this is as good as it gets. They look and feel really high quality and modern. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: These are BETTER than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome speakers and I would highly recommend to anyone out there looking for great sound without having to empty the bank! Not a lot of bass for those wanting a "THUMP" that rattles the windows but, plenty for the average listener who enjoys great quality sound! Installed in my Inspiron 17r 5737 with a Realtek High Definition sound card and it is more than enough for our huge living room! They rock! So glad I purchased them! A happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: heywood snipes

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of Logitech speakers I have purchased for my family, they work great for my wife when listening to music off her phone, and the kids watching YouTube and Netflix from there computers these speakers are perfect, they get quit loud and have great sound. I personally believe you won't find a better speakers or sound for the price. Great Product..
customer_reviews.author: Patrick DR

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at more expensive audio file speakers for my desk top, and figured why do I need audio file quality for my desk top. So I ordered these. I was amazed. They sound just as good as the Bose or Klipsch. They can play clearly at high and low volumes and have a minimum amount of distortion at higher volumes.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect the surround effects to be as good as they are. These deliver great sound on my desk without running a lot of cables everywhere. I am very discerning as to the sound of my music. These do a wonderful job with the Beats Audio system in my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Daviess

customer_reviews.title: Great ! Best I Could Find For The $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: I use these in my home gym, they are loud, you need it loud when your working out. Satisfied. Listen to Music with them only. You can hear them from different floors in the house too. I dont know how long they will last, but they are great, look great, easy for anyone to plug and play with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: ONLINE 2 BUY

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed as I was shipped a European version. There was a cheap looking adapter that came along with the speakers although they were bundled separately from the actual package. I tried using the speakers with the adapter and it would still not work so I do not know if the problem is in the adapter or in the speakers themselves, either way I do not see why anyone should buy this as it is only shipped to the US but it is obviously made for Europeans.
customer_reviews.author: I. Liu

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to place on my headboard so I can listen to my Ipod or smart phone at night. The sound is not as rich as i expected for the price,. but OK. These are ok - you might want to find something a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are junk, failed in less than a year. Totally disappointed, I have owned several Logitech products, but I have never had an item fail so quickly... Hoping it was just a lemon, but still will probably go with something else next time..
customer_reviews.author: Paul in SD

customer_reviews.title: Quality speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these speakers 2 years ago to replace the bulky speakers and subwoofer we had. They've held up great and are still working well 2 years later. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: MrStripes84

customer_reviews.title: Famosamos
customer_reviews.text: The Z520 speakers is the best pc speakers,I have ever owned. clear voice, loud volumn, the only thing I found that was not up to par, the plug adapter, it was weak did not make a good connection with the plug,poorly made. Would I buy these speakers again YES, would I recommend these speakers YES.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z520 speakers from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech Speaker System Z520 works beautifully with my computer (MacBook Pro). With 26 watts, the amplitude is more than enough for a large room. The frequency range is a huge 70 Hz to 20 kHz, which most people cannot even hear, and sounds great from any place in the room. The amplitude and on/off dial is on the front of the right speaker, which makes control very convenient. It's very simple to hook up. I doubt if any speakers for computers at this price are any better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good set of 2.0 speakers
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy just good quality sound. Like the Aux input on the side. Makes it easy to hook up and Ipad. Speakers are clear. Lack some bass but great add for a system
customer_reviews.author: Shad frazier

customer_reviews.title: Logitech speakers
customer_reviews.text: For the money, these speakers are excellent. Very often, I just don't want any sound and it's so easy to turn them off when that is the case... and when I do want sound, it is very good and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: hofmk

customer_reviews.title: secdond purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: solid construction. Sound is superior not perfect. I like good presence at high end of frequency. Could use tone controls for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of volume for sitting at the computer and listening to some tunes. Won't fill the house with sound, but fine for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Good ol' days
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are available for sale anymore and that is a pity as they have the best sound of any similar product I have come across.
customer_reviews.author: pamalama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: SWEET. I got rid of my older smaller speakers. I love logitech..!!!
customer_reviews.author: ShakFu

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, the sound is great and the price is fair. However, they are a bit larger than I wanted for transporting, but I can live with that. All in all, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: 2L's

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The speakers work well but they are much larger than I expected. Still well worth the price and gave audio to my wife's computer.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, everything was ok, the item is new in box and works like I thought. The item is like in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Morales A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers - high quality and superb sound. If you're looking to save space (no subwoofer), these are the speakers for you!
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: I love how loud it gets. I can turn my living room into a theater with these speakers. I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Raissa Young Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this shipped with a European plug which didn't fit U.S. outlets or even most European adapters. When I finally did find an adapter that fit and plugged them in, they didn't work. There is no reason for shipping products with European UPCs to U.S. customers; these are a huge waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin A. Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound
customer_reviews.text: These speakers definitely fit the bill; the sound is crisp and clear and they look fine. I put these speakers in my dining room where I keep my lap top. They work perfectly there. Since I live in a condo, I didn't want something with a ton of bass so I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro1

customer_reviews.title: Love the sound of these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these speakers a friend recommended. They turned my computer with spotify into a hi fidelity stereo and for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Marchesani

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item received.
customer_reviews.text: They sent me a wrong version, which is the version for Europe, Middle East & Africa Headquarters. Therefore, the power adapter is wrong and couldn't be plugged in United States area. I'm quite curious about how they got those items which are not even compatible with U.S. and how they sell items without knowing anything of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kyo

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep my review short and sweet: these speakers are simply amazing. Exceptional sound quality. I'm a huge fan of Logitech, and they've succeeded yet again in making another phenomenal product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Madi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The sound is very clean, good and loud. It does what propose to do
customer_reviews.author: Tulio Henrique Alves dos Santos

customer_reviews.title: ... they had more volume but the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.text: WIsh they had more volume but the sound quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Wynn

customer_reviews.title: LOUD SPEAKER!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for my classroom. My colleagues and I used to complain any of the speakers on the marker is not loud enough for the classroom. This will do!! LOUD enough and clear sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: A lot of sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these speakers for power point presentations off site. I needed speakers that would deliver sound to a room of up to around 50 people or so, and these work great. The sound is clear anf the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Decent speakers if you do not want anything special.
customer_reviews.text: Speakers look great. Sound is quality is good and loud. The only issue is that when playing movies sometimes (and this might depend on the quality of the movie) speech is not that clear even at high volumes. Music and other sounds gets louder as you turn up the volume but speech does not get as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Therapon Skotiniotis

customer_reviews.title: May not work with desk top
customer_reviews.text: Unit was gray market item with a low quality poor fitting adapter. Single audio plug was tried in both audio outputs and the head phone jack. All produced no sound. May be defective or may not work with a desk top computer.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z520 Speaker System
customer_reviews.text: All i had was the speakers on my monitor , I am very pleased with the Logitech Z520 Speaker System.The sound from them is very good, I also like the design and size of the speakers as they take up very little space on my computer desk.
customer_reviews.author: Garry G.

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Z520 = Killer Deal.
customer_reviews.text: I received the speakers four days ago and immediately plugged them in. They are sick.
customer_reviews.author: bbachman

product_meta.title: Logitech Speaker System Z520 (Black)
product_meta.description:
The Logitech Speaker System Z520. Bring your music to life-at your desk and around the house. Its 360-degree sound helps project audio evenly in all directions, so you get a great listening experience throughout the room. Amplified two-way design realistically reproduces your music, videos and games with clear, natural sound.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer Now hear this--everything. The Speaker System Z520 transforms your desktop into a room-filling sound experience. Unlike traditional front-firing speakers that focus all the sound only in one direction, Logitech 360-degree sound technology projects sound evenly in all directions. So you hear the full range of sound not just in front of the speakers, but everywhere in the room. High-performance extras like the two-way design (a separate main driver and tweeter in each speaker), deliver detailed lows, mids and highs. 26 watts (RMS) of power let you crank up the volume. There's even a convenient iPod input. So you can turn these self-powered speakers into a standalone system for listening to your favorite tunes in any room.



Hear it all, all around the room, with detailed 360-degree sound

You don't miss a beat. You want to hear every waling sax note, subtle background vocal and smooth bass line. And you want to hear it all, not just when you're sitting at your computer, but wherever you are in the room. That's a lot to ask from most desktop speakers, with one notable exception. Engineered with Logitech 360-degree sound technology, the Speaker System Z520 delivers powerful full-spectrum sound all around the room. Combined with 26 watts (RMS) of party-volume power and an input for your iPod, you're in for a music experience that ordinary speakers just can't match.






KEY FEATURES


Traditional desktop speakers focus sound in one listening “sweet spot”

Logitech 360-degree sound for room-filling audio clarity without dead spots 
A lot of desktop speakers promise a great sound experience. And that's true—as long as you sit in the narrow “sweet spot” directly in front of the speakers. But when you move out of that sweet spot, it can sound more like a dead spot. Details drop out. Your music starts to sound muddy. 
Logitech 360-degree speakers project sound evenly in all directions for a full-room sweet spot


Logitech solved this audio challenge with 360-degree sound technology. Rather than using only a forward-firing driver, Logitech speakers are acoustically engineered with both forward- and backward-firing drivers. Result? Your whole room becomes a sweet spot. That's because sound is projected and reflected more evenly and over a wider range of space. And high, mid-range and low frequencies hold together. So your music sounds full and crisp, even if you're behind the speakers. 

Amplified two-way design for twice the listening pleasure
Many desktop speakers in this price range use only one driver in each speaker. But each of these Logitech speakers has two separate drivers designed to give you a clearer, richer, more textured listening experience. The main driver delivers warm, natural mid-range and deep bass. The tweeter sings with crisp, clear highs. And dual integrated amplifiers keep every sound in perfect balance.




26 watts deliver powerful party-level volume
Feel free to crank up the volume. With 26 watts (RMS) of power, you'll have ample sound to wake the neighbors. And high volume doesn't have to mean ear-splitting screeching and crackling. Your music comes across in rich, clear, distortion-free detail, even at volumes loud enough for a Saturday night dance party. 




On-speaker iPod input for quick and easy connectivity
Why settle for speakers that only work with your computer? The Speaker System Z520 also works with your iPod or any other MP3 player. Just plug your iPod directly into the speaker input and listen to all your favorite songs in 360-degree room-filling sound. These versatile speakers also make a great standalone system for your iPod. So you can easily add music to any room in your house.



Clutter-free twin speaker design—easy on the eyes and simple to set up
You don't have to take up a lot of room on your desk to have a room full of great-sounding music, movies and games. Your new speakers are small enough to fit easily on your desk without occupying much workspace. They're simple to set up, right out of the box. And they're designed to complement the clean, contemporary style of the latest notebooks and monitors.






ENHANCE YOUR LISTENING EXPERIENCE WITH GREAT LOGITECH PRODUCTS.


Logitech Speaker System 523

Connect your 40-watt (RMS) Logitech Speaker System Z523, and rediscover the art of listening. Speakers with 360-degree sound help project audio evenly in all directions, so you get a great listening experience throughout the room.

Ultimate Ears SuperFi 4 Noise Isolating Earphones 

Featuring the same speaker technology and sound signatures used in our higher-end products, these compact earphones deliver detailed bass with crisp and clean mids and highs.

Ultimate Ears SuperFi 5 Noise Isolating Earphones

Housed in a sleek, liquid silver body, the top-fire speaker produces a detailed and full soundstage—ideal for listening to a braod range of music genres.






WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Package Contents Logitech Speaker System Z520 Power supply Quick-start guide 2-year limited hardware warranty 

System Requirements
Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Mac OS X 10.3.9 or later Sound card or 3.5 mm audio out
feature_bullets: Logitech 360-degree sound fills the room with rich audio detail
Amplified two-way design for clear, defined bass, mid-range and highs
26 Watts (RMS) power delivers powerful party-level volume
Convenience auxiliary input for quick and easy iPod plug-in
Sleek twin speaker design saves precious desktop space

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars83 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
